<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Scarlet Triad Boss](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1582)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +30

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +32, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +29, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +31, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +30, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +33

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +9

**Con** +5

**Int** +7

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ (40 arrows), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_, [infiltrator thieves' tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58), arrow with [weeping midnight poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=559)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +27 

**Ref** +33 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 315

**Return Fire** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The Scarlet Triad boss is the target of a physical ranged attack; **Effect** They gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses and the boss has their shortbow in hand, the boss Strikes the attacker with their shortbow.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_shortsword_ +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d6+12 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite shortbow_ +34 ([deadly 2d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 3d6+9 piercing

**Darting Shot** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The Scarlet Triad boss [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) a target, Strides up to their Speed, and makes a Strike with their shortbow in any order. They can Feint any target within 30 feet when using this ability.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   4d6

</column>
name: Scarlet Triad Boss
